about_the_game:
You are a pizza bike delivery boy.
Your goal is to deliver pizzas to the client as fast and as hot as you can without letting the time run out.
If the delivery (pizza) will be cold, you will lose the game so hurry up and get it done while it's still hot, you will get a huge tip!
The road is full of traffic and you have very less time to deliver the pizza. Only someone who can take his ride to its extremes can deliver the pizza on time.
But be aware the road is full of fast moving vehiclesCome Take the pizza Bike challenge if you Dare.Whether you are the lover of Free Pizza, Bikes, Cars, Car racing, Bike Racing, Bike Race or motorcycle games for Kids, boys and girls or games similar to these themes you are going to love this game.
As a pizza boy, you want to get your job as quickly as possible.
You can Enjoy your ride by jumping from the on the trucks while delivering these pizza's in dirt roads !
Features:
* Ride in different worlds
* Many interesting tracks for each world to make stunts and to ride.
* Cool stunts
* Beautiful graphics by the best designers.
Get it now and Enjoy!
detailed_description:
You are a pizza bike delivery boy.
Your goal is to deliver pizzas to the client as fast and as hot as you can without letting the time run out.
If the delivery (pizza) will be cold, you will lose the game so hurry up and get it done while it's still hot, you will get a huge tip!
The road is full of traffic and you have very less time to deliver the pizza. Only someone who can take his ride to its extremes can deliver the pizza on time.
But be aware the road is full of fast moving vehiclesCome Take the pizza Bike challenge if you Dare.Whether you are the lover of Free Pizza, Bikes, Cars, Car racing, Bike Racing, Bike Race or motorcycle games for Kids, boys and girls or games similar to these themes you are going to love this game.
As a pizza boy, you want to get your job as quickly as possible.
You can Enjoy your ride by jumping from the on the trucks while delivering these pizza's in dirt roads !
Features:
* Ride in different worlds
* Many interesting tracks for each world to make stunts and to ride.
* Cool stunts
* Beautiful graphics by the best designers.
Get it now and Enjoy!
developers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most recent version of Ubuntu LTS with the Unity, Gnome, or KDE desktops
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 1GB Memory
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 1GB Memory
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Pizza Bike Rider

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 32-bit SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8Ghz or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: DX10 compatible or better
  • Sound Card: Windows-based sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

publishers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited
short_description: Only someone who can take his ride to its extremes can deliver the pizza on time. Be aware the road is full of fast moving vehicles.Come Take the pizza Bike challenge if you Dare.Your goal is to deliver pizzas to the client as fast and as hot as you can without letting the time run out.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
